fields.name: Copper Fungicide
fields.description: Copper fungicide is commonly used to control fungal diseases in plants. It is effective against a wide range of fungi and is often used on fruit trees, vegetables, and ornamental plants.

fields.name: Neem Oil
fields.description: Neem oil is a natural insecticide and fungicide derived from the neem tree. It is effective in controlling a variety of pests and diseases, including powdery mildew, black spot, and rust.

fields.name: Bordeaux Mixture
fields.description: Bordeaux mixture is a combination of copper sulfate and lime. It is used as a broad-spectrum fungicide to protect plants from diseases such as downy mildew, leaf blight, and anthracnose.

fields.name: Sulfur Fungicide
fields.description: Sulfur fungicide is used to control fungal diseases like powdery mildew, scab, and rust. It is safe for most plants and can be applied as a dust or spray.

fields.name: Bacillus thuringiensis (Bt)
fields.description: Bacillus thuringiensis (Bt) is a naturally occurring bacterium used as a biological pesticide. It is effective against a variety of insect larvae, including caterpillars and leaf beetles.

fields.name: Potassium Bicarbonate
fields.description: Potassium bicarbonate is used as a fungicide to control powdery mildew, anthracnose, and other fungal diseases. It works by disrupting the fungal cell wall, leading to dehydration and death of the fungus.

fields.name: Horticultural Oil
fields.description: Horticultural oil is used to control a variety of insect pests and diseases. It works by smothering insects and disrupting the life cycle of pests such as aphids, mites, and whiteflies.

fields.name: Milk Spray
fields.description: Milk spray is an organic remedy used to control powdery mildew on plants. The proteins in milk act as a natural fungicide, helping to prevent and reduce fungal growth.

fields.name: Garlic Spray
fields.description: Garlic spray is a natural pesticide and fungicide. It is effective against a variety of pests and diseases, including aphids, caterpillars, and fungal infections like powdery mildew.

fields.name: Chamomile Tea
fields.description: Chamomile tea can be used as a natural fungicide to prevent damping-off disease in seedlings. It contains sulfur and other compounds that have antifungal properties.
